H0.text: Who played Clayton Farlowe in Dallas. Howard Keel

H1.text: Who played Clayton Farlowe in Dallas. Steve Forrest

H2.text: Who played Clayton Farlowe in Dallas. William Devane

H3.text: Who played Clayton Farlowe in Dallas. Harry Keel

A4.text: Howard Keel played the role of oil baron Clayton Farlow in the television series Dallas from 1981 to 1991.

A5.text: Clayton was such a hit among viewers that he was made a series regular and stayed until its end in 1991.
